org.vertx.java.core.sockjs

Class EventBusBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.core.sockjs.EventBusBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler<SockJSSocket>

    public class EventBusBridge
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler<SockJSSocket>
    Bridges the event bus to the client side.

    Instances of this class are not thread-safe.

      • handleSendOrPub

        protected boolean handleSendOrPub(SockJSSocket sock,
                      boolean send,
                      JsonObject msg,
                      java.lang.String address)
        Client is sending or publishing on the socket
        Parameters:
        sock - The sock
        send - if true it's a send else it's a publish
        msg - The message
        address - The address the message is being sent/published to
        Returns:
        true To allow the send/publish to occur, false otherwise
